attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament and call an immediate election in response to the public reaction to MPs expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition calls on the PM to request HM the Queen to dissolve the current Parliament and call an immediate General Election in oredr to restore public faith in our system of democratic government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
